title: SPE Chapter 01 - Simple: Single-File PHP 8.5 Application
description:
Chapter 01 of Simple PHP Examples - building a complete web application in 32 lines using modern PHP 8.5 features.

This tutorial covers:
‚Ä¢ Anonymous class pattern for self-contained apps
‚Ä¢ PHP 8.3 typed constants
‚Ä¢ PHP 8.4 asymmetric visibility (public private(set))
‚Ä¢ PHP 8.5 pipe operator for data transformation
‚Ä¢ First-class callables with spread syntax
‚Ä¢ Dynamic navigation generation
